Graphene UI documentation
========================================

Graphene UI is the open-source front-end for `Graphene <https://github.com/graphene-blockchain>`_. A live hosted wallet running a custom themed version of Graphene UI for Graphene can be found at `<https://wallet.gph.ai>`_


Contents:

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: The basics

   getting_started

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Project structure

   structure
   data_layer
   components

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: General info

   contributing
   license
   help
